++ Rest Test

The web interface exposes a HTML interface to a JSON/HAL website.

 * urls can be resources/collections of objects
 * you specify what actions are possible for each page
 * the interface allows items to be added to the page
 * 'click the x and then y happens'
 * actions on the resource determine the next resource

 * life engine style box for entering a URL
 * URL is then parameterizable
 * things can be marked as collections
